title: Seeking participants for study on relationships
selftext:
Hello, fellow Redditors!  
I am conducting a research study on relationships in different cultural contexts, and I'm looking for participants who speak English and have been in a relationship for six months or longer. I would greatly appreciate your help!  
The aim of this study is to gain insights into the dynamics of relationships across various cultural backgrounds. By participating, you'll contribute to our understanding of how cultural factors influence relationships and potentially help improve intercultural relationship experiences.  
Who can participate? If you meet the following criteria, I would love to hear from you:  
You speak English fluently.  
You have been in a relationship for six months or more.  
You are open to answering questions about your relationship experiences.  
What does participation involve? Participation is completely voluntary and confidential. It involves completing an online questionnaire that explores different aspects of your relationship, including communication, conflict resolution, cultural influences, and more. The questionnaire should take approximately 20 minutes to complete.  
How to participate? To take part in this study, please click on the following link to access the questionnaire: [https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdwVB5M-udLynDlUqCnp2LG7BuC4bJjHKzD1FCTdkJcFzDu6A/viewform?usp=sf\_link](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdwVB5M-udLynDlUqCnp2LG7BuC4bJjHKzD1FCTdkJcFzDu6A/viewform?usp=sf_link)  
Ethics and confidentiality This study has received ethical approval, and your responses will be treated with strict confidentiality. Your personal information will remain anonymous, and data will be used only for research purposes.  
Any questions? If you have any questions or would like more information about the study, feel free to comment below or send me a direct message. I'll be happy to provide any necessary clarifications.  
Thank you in advance for your participation and for supporting research in the field of relationships and cultural contexts. Your contribution is valuable and greatly appreciated!
